mapper.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, HEADTITLE, CONTENTS, NUMBER, BIGHEADTITLE, NUMBER, NAME FROM NOTICE_BOARD WHERE NUMBER = #{NUMBER};
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE_BOARD (ID, BIGHEADTITLE, HEADTITLE, TITLE, CONTENTS, NAME, NUMBER, TIME) values (#{ID}, #{BIGHEADTITLE}, #{HEADTITLE}, #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, #{NAME}, NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{TIME});
